entry.title: Saturday: Showers at times heavy. High 24.
entry.summary: Sunny then a mix of sun and cloud with showers at times heavy beginning this afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm late this afternoon. Local amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 24. Humidex 25. UV index 9 or very high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Showers at times heavy. Low 7.
entry.summary: Showers at times heavy ending before morning then cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Local amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low 7. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: Showers ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High 13. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023
